name: email-handler
description: email-handler: Node.js Gmail handler via googleapis Gmail API

scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV='development' && export NODE_CONFIG_DIR='../database/config/' && node index.js
scripts.prod: export NODE_ENV='production'  && export NODE_CONFIG_DIR='../database/config/' && node index.js

author: Andrew Forrester <andrew@andrew-forrester.com>
